info.title: HMPPS Core Person Record
info.description:
Overview

This service provides an endpoint to retrieve a person by UUID.

Data provided

The vast majority of the data is sourced from the CPR Record which gets the data from Nomis, Delius & HMCTS source systems.

The data returned for each person record is essentially data that has been retrieved from Nomis, Delius or HMCTS. This includes the following:
  • Identifiers from any of the following source systems : Nomis, Delius & HMCTS
  • Source System itself, so whether it from Nomis, Delius or HMCTS source system.
See the schema definition for the API for full details.

Role restrictions

Role restrictions in this service are applied by a `@PreAuthorize` annotation at either resource or service level. Furthermore the annotation can be applied at individual method level or class level.

Each endpoint in this API documentation should normally include what restrictions are applied. If there is any doubt then it is worth looking at the github repository here and looking at the endpoint in question.

The following roles are currently in use in this service:
  1. ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO: Grants access to the Retrieve person record by UUID

Types of endpoints

Retrieve person record by UUID

This will give back a person record with data including Identifiers associated with that UUID.

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

500.description: Unrecoverable error occurred whilst processing request.

parameters.name: cprImmigrationStatusId
parameters.description: The identifier of the prison immigration status

put.description:
Create person record by CRN. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__PROBATION_RW** . 
      Includes all fields relating to core person information

post.description: Update the sexual orientation by prison number. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__SYSCON_SYNC_RW**.

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

post.description: Updates the prison religion records for the given prison number

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

post.description: Creates a new prison nationality record, or updates the existing one if a record matching the prison number is found

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

post.description: Update the immigration status by prison number. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__SYSCON_SYNC_RW**.

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

post.description: Update the disability status by prison number. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__SYSCON_SYNC_RW**.

parameters.name: prisonNumber
parameters.description: The identifier of the offender source system (NOMIS)

get.description: Retrieve person record by UUID. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO**

Retrieve person record by CRN. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO** . 
      For Identifiers the crn, prisonNumber, defendantId, cids come from all records related to this person.
      The other Identifiers come from just this person
      **cprUUID is not supplied on this endpoint.**

Retrieve person record by Prison Number. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO** . 
      For Identifiers the crn, prisonNumber, defendantId, cids come from all records related to this person.
      The other Identifiers come from just this person
      **cprUUID is not supplied on this endpoint.**

Retrieve person record by Defendant ID. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO** . 
      For Identifiers the crn, prisonNumber, defendantId, cids come from all records related to this person.
      The other Identifiers come from just this person
      **cprUUID is not supplied on this endpoint.**

titleCode.description: The title code of the person

firstName.description: The first name of the person

lastName.description: The last name of the person

interestToImmigration.description: Flag indicating whether data is an interest to immigration

modifyDateTime.description: The sexual orientation modify date and time

modifyUserId.description: The sexual orientation modify user id

modifyDateTime.description: The religion modify date and time

religions.description: The list of religions for a given prison number

modifyDateTime.description: The nationality modify date and time
The disability modify date and time

cprUUID.description: Person CPR uuid. **If the record has been merged, this will be the CPR uuid of the record it has been merged to**

api-role.description: A HMPPS Auth access token with the `ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO` role.
api-role.name: Authorization
